Install
=======

**repliclust** is hosted on the Python Package Index (PyPI). To install 
the package, enter your terminal and run the following command:

.. code-block::

    $ pip install repliclust

If the `pip` command does not work on your machine, you may need to 
install it.
See `here <https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/installation/>`_ for more 
information.
